channel.title: Posts on evan's weekly updates
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on evan's weekly updates

item.title: 2 - The Final Placeholder
item.description: Hello again. This is the final placeholder entry. I don’t really like using markdown, but why not. It is nice to write entries in VIM. I wonder if it looks terrible. I am typing more to see how a large paragraph looks. Sometimes I do words per minute speedtests online. I can type 90 words per minute. I do it in a strange way; it is not the normal home row method.

item.title: 1 - A Placeholder Entry
